description:
Learn Angular 2, the new version of the wildly popular JavaScript web framework created by Google. Current status: all examples updated for Angular 2.0.0-rc.3.

This course will guide you through:

  • Understanding the basic Angular 2 concepts: Components, Templates, Services, Dependency Injection, etc.
  • Choosing the best language: traditional JavaScript (ES5), new JavaScript (ES6), or TypeScript
  • Making HTTP requests and integrating with a backend
  • Setting up a production-ready build workflow using NPM and Webpack

More sections will be added over the next few weeks. Angular 2 is not final yet so a few things are still changing. Hence the Early Access notice.

The current price reflects the content available right now, and will increase over time. By purchasing now you will have access to all future updates as well. Next price increase planned for July 1.
title: Angular 2 From The Ground Up
